pageContent: Microwave Weapons Used on U.S. Civilians https://www.targetedjustice.com/microwave-burns.html TJlawsuit@use.startmail.com The CIA & U.S. Space Force operate these weapons from Schriever AFB in Colorado, targeting political activists, whistleblowers, and scientists, etc. The FBI and Fusion Centers are involved in the cover-up . Key Evidence - 1) Credible Sources - 30 Medical Doctors and Scientists confirm the Targeted Individual Program is real. It is an Unacknowledged Special Access Program (USAP) funded by the CIA. See our list of names. https://www.targetedjustice.com 2) Sworn affidavits from 2 FBI agents confirm the Targeted Individual Program is real. https://www.targetedjustice.com/affidavits.html 3) The National Academies of Science confirmed the existence of microwave weapons, and stated they are “the most plausible mechanism” for the attacks on US Diplomats. https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2020/12/cuba-china-microwave-attackes-diplomats-spies-science-report/ 4) U.S. Patents 4,345,220 and 4,877,027. The 4000 scientists at the U.S. Patent Office are not liars. https://www.targetedjustice.com/timeline-for-satellite-weapons.html 5) “Titan D.E.W. Capabilities” - technical paper published by engineers at the Titan Corporation in San Leandro, CA; admitting they built the High-Powered Microwave weapons under contract to the USAF. https://www.targetedjustice.com/timeline-for-satellite-weapons.html TargetedJustice.com
